```{r}
# Let's create a vector of nested collections
collection.names <- c(
  "Heals"
)
project_number_in_cristin <- 2710649

# Create the collections
create.collections <- c2z::Zotero(
  collection.names = collection.names,
  library = TRUE,
  create = TRUE,
  silent = TRUE
)

# Find collections
collections <- c2z::Zotero(
  collection.names = collection.names,
  recursive = TRUE,
  library = TRUE,
  silent = TRUE
)

# Filter items
cristin.filter <- 
  c2z::CristinSupported() |>
  dplyr::pull(cristin.category)

# Query Cristin
cristin <- c2z::Cristin(
  project_code = project_number_in_cristin, 
  filter = cristin.filter,
  zotero.import = TRUE,
  use.identifiers = TRUE,
  crossref.search = TRUE,
  autosearch = TRUE,
  silent = FALSE
)

# Get the fox key
key <- collections$collections |> 
  dplyr::filter(name %in% collection.names) |> 
  dplyr::pull("key")

# Post the items to the collection called key
post.cristin <- 
  c2z::Zotero(
  collection.key = key,
  metadata = cristin$results,
  library = TRUE,
  index = TRUE,
  post = TRUE,
  post.collections = FALSE,
  post.items = TRUE,
  silent = TRUE
)

# Select only names in index and print
# post.cristin$index |> 
#   dplyr::select(name) |>
#   print(width = 80)


bibliography <- c2z::Zotero(
  collection.names = collection.names,
  recursive = TRUE,
  library = TRUE,
  export = TRUE,
  format = "biblatex",
  save.data = TRUE,
  save.path = getwd(),
  bib.name = "references",
  csl.type = "apa-single-spaced",
  csl.name = "style",
  silent = TRUE
)

cat(c2z::ZoteroFormat(bibliography$results, format = "JSON"))
```
